emails.subject: Re: PT Interindo PO#2408014-10PL | ETA SIN 10/09/24 | ETA JAKARTA 13/09/24 | AN HAI
emails.content: Dear All, Here are the new pic list. thank you On Thu, Mar 27, 2025 at 12:42 PM ShippingCoordinator <msgubts@gmail.com> wrote: Dear Juliet, Thank you for reaching out regarding the latest vessel
actionItems: Review the new pick list provided by the customer
answers: The procedure for reviewing pick lists in shipping and logistics typically involves verifying the items listed against the actual inventory to ensure accuracy. This process includes checking quantities, item descriptions, and any special instructions. It is important to confirm that all items are available and correctly documented before proceeding with packing and shipping. Additionally, any discrepancies should be noted and resolved promptly to maintain efficiency and accuracy in the shipping process.
